feedback:
Excellent application of the DRIVER framework throughout your work. You clearly demonstrated 6 stages: D, R, I, V, E, R2.


STRENGTHS:
- Financial APP: The submission clearly describes and demonstrates a working financial application (an AI-powered financial explanation engine with input prompts, multiple complexity levels, history/favorites, and API integration). Implement-stage evidence of functional features plus the described use cases supports a PASS.
- Integrate AI: The submission demonstrates effective AI integration: an API-driven engine that generates tiered explanations and includes persistent memory/favorites, showing functionality beyond superficial calls. The Discover and Implement stages provide clear evidence of purposeful AI use and iterative improvement, satisfying the PASS criteria.

criteria.criterion_name: Financial APP: The tool functions as a financial application.
evidence: "This is what I created through the app VO and it is a financial explanation engine."
"the first version only had just the straight up calculator and then I created a second version where it had a memory state"
"you're going to input a question and you're going to pick the complexity level between very simple basic intermediate advanced and then expert"
criteria.driver_alignment: Discover: student identified the assignment to build an advanced AI finance tool ("we had to build an advanced AI finance tool..."). Implement: student built and iterated the app (calculator → memory state, API integrations) and demonstrated features. Reflect: student explains motivation to help users with financial questions, confirming a finance-focused purpose.
criteria.reasoning: The submission clearly describes and demonstrates a working financial application (an AI-powered financial explanation engine with input prompts, multiple complexity levels, history/favorites, and API integration). Implement-stage evidence of functional features plus the described use cases supports a PASS.

criteria.criterion_name: Integrate AI: The tool integrates AI capabilities effectively.
evidence: "So, we had to build an advanced AI finance tool using like an AI AP API key or anything that takes um it creates an AI response based on what you input."
"This is what I created through the app VO and it is a financial explanation engine."
"the first version only had just the straight up calculator and then I created a second version where it had a memory state which is the history."
criteria.driver_alignment: Discover — identified using an AI/API-driven approach and target use case; Implement — built the financial explanation engine with multi-level AI responses, history/memory and favorites; Reflect — stated user-oriented motivation for the AI tool.
criteria.reasoning: The submission demonstrates effective AI integration: an API-driven engine that generates tiered explanations and includes persistent memory/favorites, showing functionality beyond superficial calls. The Discover and Implement stages provide clear evidence of purposeful AI use and iterative improvement, satisfying the PASS criteria.
